line.text: Two loves I have of comfort and despair
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which like two spirits do suggest me still
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The better angel is a man right fair
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The worser spirit a woman coloured ill
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To win me soon to hell my female evil
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Tempteth my better angel from my side
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And would corrupt my saint to be a devil
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Wooing his purity with her foul pride
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And whether that my angel be turned fiend
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Suspect I may yet not directly tell
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But being both from me both to each friend
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: I guess one angel in another hell
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Yet this shall I neer know but live in doubt
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Till my bad angel fire my good one out
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
